SEARCH
Package gw.api.database

Class QueryBeanResultWithSummary<QT extends Bean,RT>

java.lang.Object
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.QueryProcessorBase<QT>
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.WrappingQueryProcessor<QT>
gw.api.database.QueryBeanResultWithSummary<QT,RT>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.IQueryBeanResultInternal<QT>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.IQueryResultInternal<QT,QT>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IQueryBeanResultWithSummary<QT,RT>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IWrappedQueryResult<QT,QT>, IQueryBeanResult<QT>, IQueryResult<QT,QT>, IQueryResultSet<QT>, Serializable, Iterable<QT>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CCQueryBeanResultWithSummary, StandardQueryBeanResultWithSummary
public class QueryBeanResultWithSummary<QT extends Bean,RT> extends com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.WrappingQueryProcessor<QT> implements com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IQueryBeanResultWithSummary<QT,RT>
Wraps a IQueryBeanResult containing search results together with and a IQueryBeanResult that produces the summary query row for those results. The constructor is parameterized with both the main query results and the summary query results.
Author:
Allan Heydon

  • Constructor Details

    • QueryBeanResultWithSummary

      public QueryBeanResultWithSummary(IQueryBeanResult<QT> queryResults, IQueryResult<QT,RT> summaryResults, QueryBeanResultWithSummary.ValueMapper<RT> mapper)
      Constructs a new summary query holder. The mapper instance is responsible to mapping string keys to values in the result type.
      Parameters:
      queryResults - the main query results
      summaryResults - the results of the summary query
      mapper - maps between string values, usually found in the summaryValue in pebbles, to values in the result

  • Method Details

      public IQueryResult<QT,RT> getSummaryResults()

      Specified by:

    • addPersistentFilter

      public void addPersistentFilter(IQueryFilter filter)
      Description copied from interface: IQueryResult
      Adds filter to this query that persists and won't be cleared by IQueryResult.clearNonPersistentFilters(). If the filter is null, this is treated like a no-op.
      Specified by:
      addPersistentFilter in interface IQueryResult<QT extends Bean,RT>
      Overrides:
      addPersistentFilter in class com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.WrappingQueryProcessor<QT extends Bean>
      Parameters:
      filter - the filter to add. From Gosu, this should be an instance of StandardQueryFilter.

    • extractValue

      public Number extractValue(RT summaryResult, String path)
      Maps the path given, typically in a pebbles summaryRow, to a number using the summary row result.
      It is up to the implementor of this to provide the mapping from the raw object type to a Number
      Specified by:
      extractValue in interface com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IQueryBeanResultWithSummary<QT extends Bean,RT>
      Parameters:
      summaryResult - the summary row result
      path - the path used to find the result
      Returns:
      the number mapped to the path or null

    • extractCurrency

      public Currency extractCurrency(RT summaryResult, String path)
      Maps the path given, typically in a pebbles summaryRow, to a Currency using the summary row result.
      It is up to the implementor of this to provide the mapping from the raw object type to a Currency
      Specified by:
      extractCurrency in interface com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IQueryBeanResultWithSummary<QT extends Bean,RT>
      Parameters:
      summaryResult - the summary row result
      path - the path used to find the result
      Returns:
      the currency mapped to the path or null

    • allowMultipleSummaryRows

      public boolean allowMultipleSummaryRows()
      Indicates whether or not multiple summary rows should be allowed. Currently the only use case for this is multi-currency, when a SUM is done on an amount column and the Currency is also selected, resulting in a GROUP BY on the Currency. If this method returns true, multiple summary rows will call the sum to be nulled out; otherwise, multiple summary rows will result in an exception.
      Specified by:
      allowMultipleSummaryRows in interface com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IQueryBeanResultWithSummary<QT extends Bean,RT>
      Returns:
      true if multiple summary rows are allowed, false if not
